search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Tapfiliate (tapfiliate.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for Tapfiliate can be found at: [https://tapfiliate.com/plans/](https://tapfiliate.com/plans/)【3:0†source】.

citations.title: Tapfiliate Plans | Affiliate & Referral Tracking Software With Fair Pricing

Questions about our plans
-------------------------

Looking for something else? Check our [support knowledge base](https://support.tapfiliate.com/en/) or [docs](https://tapfiliate.com/docs/).

Can I try Tapfiliate for free?

![Image 55: arrow](blob:http://localhost/a0245ebdf26da6fc17918c9a7214d870)

Yes, you can try the Tapfiliate Essential and Pro plans for free during your 14 day free trial. You can freely up- and downgrade during your trial without getting billed.

Can I get a refund?

![Image 57: arrow](blob:http://localhost/a0245ebdf26da6fc17918c9a7214d870)

Absolutely! We offer a 30-day money-back guarantee, which starts right after your free trial. You can read through our refund policy for more detailed information.

Can I change my plan?

![Image 59: arrow](blob:http://localhost/a0245ebdf26da6fc17918c9a7214d870)

Yes, at any time! When you upgrade, the current billing cycle will be prorated.

What are team members?

![Image 61: arrow](blob:http://localhost/a0245ebdf26da6fc17918c9a7214d870)

You can add team members if you want your colleagues to be able to co-manage your programs. You can determine the access and permissions for each team member, and add or remove members along the way.

What if i go over my plan’s limits?

![Image 63: arrow](blob:http://localhost/a0245ebdf26da6fc17918c9a7214d870)

If you exceed the monthly included impressions, clicks or conversions for your plan, we calculate a small overage fee. You can see the overage pricing per plan by clicking “show all” above.
